channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: Talk about the good old days here.

item.title: Nostalgia
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shadowofdeath)
item.dc:creator: Shadowofdeath
item.content:encoded: So who wants to fire up DA for a round or two sometime?

item.title: What is your classic DA:UT map?
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded:
which of these maps do you consider as being classic from DA:UT?

Votes will help us decide which ones to port for our 'classic' maps

DA-Ruins has already been ported to DA2.

There where many more maps but poll only allows 10 max

item.title: DA:UT Homepage finished
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded:
I have finally got around to replacing the blank DA:UT homepage with some content. Its the same design as the DA2 Homepage but with different gfx and links. Enjoy

Now the DA:UT site feels complete


www.planetunreal.com/da/ut

item.title: Servers
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rhys Kitikion)
item.dc:creator: Rhys Kitikion
item.content:encoded:
Any servers for this game still floating around? Would like to know. I've been playing this with one other person and we've been getting slightly annoyed because of how hard it is just for the two of us.

If not any servers... how about people who still play it?

item.title: Defence Alliance : Last Colony
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded: Is DA:LC still alive Eizo? or is it on hold?

item.title: Download Defence Alliance v1.7 for UT
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded:
People who still own a copy of Unreal Tournament (UT99) can download Defence Alliance UT 1.7 here from our DA:UT site.

www.planetunreal.com/da/ut

More Info on the download can be found here:
http://www.planetunreal.com/da/ut/downloads/release_1v7.asp

Download Mirrors

FULL EXE
http://www.extreme-players.de/showfiles.asp?ID=5347
http://www.i-netplay.com/downloads/games/ut/mods/DA/DACE17Full.exe...

Download Defence Alliance v1.7 for UT
